item.title: SWN
item.description: score:36 Chances: Southwestern Energy’s Q4 earnings were positively impacted by higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases. The longer-term bull case for natural gas rests on expanding U.S. exports, which could benefit companies like Southwestern Energy. The company delivered strong cash flow despite lower commodity prices, indicating resilience in its financial performance.
